alert.note: Alert for Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 14 at 8:51AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle Nebraska and southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, in panhandle Nebraska, Garden. In southwest Nebraska, Keith. * WHEN...Until 545 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 748 AM MST, the river stage on the North Platte River at Lewellen was 7.7 feet. The river stage is expected to remain steady around 8.0 feet over the next several days. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lewellen, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Ruthon and Eagle Gulch Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
